name: Nehmat Shenoy
text: I was utterly captivated by the characters and the world they inhabited. The performances were absolutely captivating. I was completely absorbed in the world of the film.

name: Indrans Dash
text: I can't wait to watch it again!

name: Rohan Soni
text: I was completely enthralled by every moment of it. I was left in awe of the sheer brilliance of it all. The movie reminded me why I love cinema.

name: Anvi Bhalla
text: I was blown away by the creativity and imagination. It's rare to find a movie that's as visually stunning as it is emotionally resonant, but this one delivered on both fronts. I was completely swept up in the world of the film.
